aboutProject.title: About this project
aboutProject.description: This is an Angular V.16 project, which was developed with the next basic tools for this Framework
aboutProject.componentsDesc: They are the base for each Angular project, they can be built from other smaller components, and some examples in this projects are the Alerts, the Loader, the Footer, and more. The main idea about components, is that you can re-use them inside other modules of your application.
aboutProject.servicesDesc: They are classes that you can instantiate in other components of your project, to share data between them, or just to declare functions that are going to be common. In this project, there is only one service, and inside of it, the methods to call APIs and get Naruto info are declared.
aboutProject.routingDesc: As a SPA (Single Page Application), the way to change between screens is routing. There are five routes in these project: 'main-page', 'clans', 'characters', 'about' y 'author', each one of them takes you to a speciffic page.
aboutProject.modulesDesc: Modules are used to declare components or dependencies that are going to be used in speciffic screens
aboutProject.lazyLoadingDesc: It is a strategy to download only the modules that the user requires. This way, the application will charge faster.
aboutProject.formsDesc: A very helpfull way to interact with forms components. In the application, reactive forms are implemented to detect changes in Input components within Clans and Characters pages.
aboutProject.apiDesc: It is the dependency proposed by Angular to call APIs. An instance of HttpModule is used in the service to bring information from the backend.
aboutProject.interceptorsDesc: As its name says, they allow you to intercept Http requests before they connect with the server, to perform certain task. In the project, there is an interceptor that shows the loader when the request just started, and hides it when it has finished.
aboutProject.otherFeatures: Also, other tools to make the front end development easier were used
aboutProject.bootstrapDesc: It is a library which adds styles to HTML tags when speciffic classes are defined. Within the project, bootstrap is mostly used for Responsive behavior, it means, that elements are placed correctly on screen, whatever its size is.
aboutProject.cssDesc: Style Sheets in this project are not a .css file. SASS is used to have a better manage of styles, by defining variables and importing them in different components.
aboutProject.internationalizationDesc: It allows to change the page language. Click the button on the top right corner of the page and find out.
aboutProject.unitTestingDesc: Very important for any project development. It assures you that your components will do what they are supposed to do. And in case of improvements or new features, they assure that the changes have not impacted in the bussiness logic.
aboutProject.thanks: Thanks a lot for taking the time to check this project out. I have developed it in my free time with so much passion, for Naruto and of course Angular.
